0.1.name: wordpress/my-lovely-theme
0.1.description: Free black clean and creative WordPress theme developed by myThem.es. Theme features: internal likes, custom colors, custom background, post formats, under construction template, custom templates, custom logo, custom favicon; additional widgets: social, related posts, newsletter, flickr,  post meta and post categories.
